items.title: Network Engineer
items.organisation: United States Air Force - 60th Communications Squadron
details: Leadership position. Manager of 3-member team, responsible for maintenance and installation of monitoring software and network equipment.
Oversaw the implementation of software updates for network intrusion systems. Resulted in $10k annual savings for unit and increased security posture.

items.title: Network Engineer
items.organisation: United States Air Force - 412th Communications Squadron
details: Member of 8-person team responsible for the maintenance and installation of hardened network security equipment andsoftware to enable secure communication and data transmission.
Deployed over 100 Cisco routers and switches as part of $14 million network upgrade in under 3 months for use by 8,000 users.
